long_description: O'Neill Lennox Board Shorts for men offer classic comfort for kayaking, canoeing, stand up paddleboarding and anything else that involves water. Stretchy fabric offers the freedom to move that makes all watersports more enjoyable. The O'Neill Lennox Board Shorts for men feature a traditional lace-up board-shorts closure.
short_description: O'Neill Lennox Board Shorts for men offer classic comfort for kayaking, canoeing, stand up paddleboarding and anything else that involves water.
